text: @ScrambledAdams Takes years of practice, of course, a present before the present now, but that was eleven years ago, and much has happened since then.

passages.fragment: Takes years of practice , of course ,
passages.full_quote: <used>Takes years of practice, of course, s</used>ecretary Susan at the office, not you, of course

passages.fragment: , of course , a present before the present now , but that was
passages.full_quote: Nice man, <used>of course, a present before the present now, but that was</used> just their fun ( and in any case he had other things on his mind

passages.fragment: , but that was eleven years ago , and
passages.full_quote: Somebody did once look at his watch, <used>but that was eleven years ago, and</used> there has been no follow-up

passages.full_quote: That was many <used>years ago, and much has happened since then</used>.
